classSpec.desc: defines a set of attributes which certain elements may use to represent metrical information.
definisce un insieme di attributi utilizzati entro determinati elementi per rappresentare informazioni relative alla metrica
define un grupo de atributos utilizados dentro de determinados elementos para representar información métrica

attDef.desc: contains a user-specified encoding for the conventional metrical structure of the element.
contiene una codifica, definita dall'utente, della struttura metrica convenzionale dell'elemento
contiene una codificación definida por el usuario de la estructura métrica convencional del elemento.
ユーザー定義の韻律表記法を示す．
attDef.valDesc: May contain either a standard term for the kind of metrical unit (e.g. hexameter) or an encoded representation for the metrical pattern (e.g. +--+-+-+-+-). In either case, the notation used should be documented by a metDecl element within the encodingDesc of the associated header.

remarks.p: Where this attribute is not specified, the metrical pattern for the element concerned is understood to be inherited from its parent.

attDef.desc: contains a user-specified encoding for the actual realization of the conventional metrical structure applicable to the element.
contiene una codifica, definita dall'utente, dell'effettiva realizzazione della struttura metrica convenzionale applicabile all'elemento
contiene un codificación definida por el usuario para la realización efectiva de la estructura métrica convencional aplicable al elemento.
ユーザー定義による，韻律構造の実際の出現形を表記する方法を示す．
attDef.valDesc: May contain either a standard term for the kind of metrical unit (e.g. hexameter) or an encoded representation for the metrical pattern (e.g. +--+-+-+-+-). In either case, the notation used should be documented by a metDecl element within the encodingDesc of the associated header.

remarks.p: Where this attribute is not specified, the metrical realization for the element concerned is understood to be identical to that specified or implied for the met attribute.

attDef.desc: specifies the rhyme scheme applicable to a group of verse lines.
specifica lo schema rimico di un gruppo di versi
especifica el esquema de la rima de un grupo de versos.
attDef.valDesc: By default, the rhyme scheme is expressed as a string of alphabetic characters each corresponding with a rhyming line. Any non-rhyming lines should be represented by a hyphen or an X. Alternative notations may be defined as for met by use of the metDecl element in the TEI header.

remarks.p: When the default notation is used, it does not make sense to specify this attribute on any unit smaller than a line. Nor does the default notation provide any way to record internal rhyme, or to specify non-conventional rhyming practice. These extensions would require user-defined alternative notations.
